item.title: Recover data
item.description: Formatee una partici√≥n de ext4 como swap accidentalmente. Que capo. sudo blkid /dev/sda5 /dev/sda5: UUID="ddebee74-bcb2-45ce-86e5-0d79bb0bf80f" TYPE="swap" PARTUUID="093b9d2d-69d3-4eed-beeb-f6276b63faae" https://old.reddit.com/r/linuxquestions/comments/k9m61h/accidentally_ran_mkswap_on_ext4_partition/ sudo dumpe2fs -h -o superblock=8193 /dev/sde2 If 8193 doesn’t work, try 32768. (There’s a bit of complicated logic to determine where alternate superblocks might live. Hopefully one of these two will work on your filesystem.) sudo e2fsck -b 8193 /dev/sde2
